channel.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
channel.description:
Hey, Ive got a 562 Server and the Base is Rs2Hd. There are a few Glitches/Problems and things I want on my Server. If I ask for something and you have found a thread to tell me how to do that, Please post the Link. Anyway this is what im Stuck on:
- [s]When you trade it doesnt show what you will Give and Recieve on the second screen.[/s] - When you drop Items they Disappear - [s]Is there any way how to make it so I dont even need to run the source? So the server is already Activated all of the time.[/s] - How would I add Ancient Curses? - [s]How would I add a Fun Pk?[/s]
Thanks a Lot! I will Rep++ for an Answer for even one Question that works!

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:387140”]1. Send the “display items on interface” packet with the information about the items. (look at packet 53 server-client in the 317)
2. Send the “drop item” packet.[/quote]

Sorry, I dont really know what you mean. Could you Explain it for me? Btw im 562 not 317

Read full topic

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. Send the “display items on interface” packet with the information about the items. (look at packet 53 server-client in the 317)
  2. Send the “drop item” packet.

Read full topic

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

dun dun dun:

well i know for ancient curses, it needs load either 602 or 614 i believe sorry if im not right, and the trade thing, all 562’s do that, ive tried to fix it but it doesnt work. then i think for the “dont even need to the source” get a vps i think or you just cant do that lolz

Ah, Ok, Thanks for the Help anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

Hey, Ive got a 562 Server and the Base is Rs2Hd. There are a few Glitches/Problems and things I want on my Server. If I ask for something and you have found a thread to tell me how to do that, Please post the Link. Anyway this is what im Stuck on:

  • When you trade it doesnt show what you will Give and Recieve on the second screen.
  • When you drop Items they Disappear
  • Is there any way how to make it so I dont even need to run the source? So the server is already Activated all of the time.
  • How would I add Ancient Curses?
  • How would I add a Fun Pk?

Thanks a Lot! I will Rep++ for an Answer for even one Question that works!

Read full topic
